law.catch_line: After making the distribution required under § 2-613 of this subtitle, of the remaining income tax ...
law.text:
After making the distribution required under § 2-613 of this subtitle, of the remaining income tax revenue from corporations, the Comptroller shall distribute:
6% to the Higher Education Investment Fund established under § 15-106.6 of the Education Article; and
9.15% to the General Fund.
